message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this amazing product and I think you'd really love it! I'm offering it to you for $135. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
Bob, I appreciate your interest, but $100 is just a bit too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $115. How about we split the difference this time?
I understand that you're willing to come down to $115, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $110?
